comments.body:
Is this type parameter `PassThrough` used ? Or can we make it 

```scala
sealed trait JmsEnvelopeWithProperties extends JmsEnvelope[NotUsed] {
```
I _think_ it's required because it's used in pass through JMS messages. If I omit it then type param errors with the `JmsMessage` pass through factory methods.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +73,77 @@ * Marker trait for stream elements that contain pass-through data with properties.
 */
sealed trait JmsEnvelopeWithProperties[+PassThrough] extends JmsEnvelope[PassThrough] {
  def withProperty(name: String, value: Any): JmsEnvelopeWithProperties[PassThrough]
